article: After the earthquake, the rescuers arrived at the disaster area as soon as possible. In a(n) _ house, they found a woman. She was dead when the rescuers found her. Through the ruins, they could see her last _ . Being on her knees, the upper part of her body was _ , with her hands on the ground to _ her body. It looked strange because she was bent out of _ . The leader came to the body, reached out his hands under the woman, feeling and touching, and then he shouted loudly, "There is someone, a _ , still living." Through some effort, rescuers _ up the bricks covering her body. Under her body was her baby, who was _ Because he was well protected by the mother's body, he was _ safe. He was sleeping when the rescuers carried him out, and his lovely and peaceful face _ everyone around him. The doctor, along with the rescue team, opened the _ to check if the baby was all right, and he found there was a mobile phone in the quilt. The doctor looked at the screen. A written message was there, "My dear baby, if you live, don't _ how much I love you." The mobile phone was passed on to the other people; every person who saw this message was close to tears.
